title: WTB/WTTF: EPDGs I need. Help! (Feb 2, down to 11 left!)
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: WTB/WTTF: EPDGs I need. Help! (Feb 2, down to 11 left!)
posts.post_content:
Help me out! Please?!?! ;)

Hey everyone, looking for a few EPDGs for my collection. Been working on this for just over 5 years and I just broke through 90% of the subset.....so I’m looking for the following regardless of condition....well would prefer not highest grades but am still listening of course. Quite familiar with what’s on eBay but if you have something there I need and can wiggle on prices, let me know.

I have a few low grade ones available for trade too, Mostly low grade with some trimmed.

Looking for:
Cobb, Ty (Bat Off Shoulder)
Cobb, Ty (Portrait - Red)
Hummel, John
Tinker, Joe (Bat Off Shoulder)
Young, Cy (With Glove)
Anyone out there?  Looking for EPDGs!
I would love to knock some off your list!
Down to needing 13....if you have any of these available in any condition, please let me know.

Down to 11.  Please help me out!  Really would love to knock off another 2 or 3 and get that ball rolling.....

Have cash/Paypal ready!
